name: Pigeon POOlitics
description:
Pigeons and their bird friends have decided to stop being bystanders and get involved in the presidential elections! You can help them poop on their opposing party and laugh at the funny dialogues and reaction of people to them!

When you poop in Pigeon POOlitics, your poop counts! You can see the poop statistics in different states and know what your neighboring pigeons are up to!

Pigeon POOlitics is not only an entertaining game, but also a fun way to stay on top of daily election news! Our highly trained owls curate the best of the political news and bring it to you in fun, bite-sized snippets!

Don’t wait any longer! If you want to get in on some pooping action, laugh and get updates on the latest election news, download Pigeon POOlitics and help the birds with their pooping journey!

Features:

- Funny caricatures of famous politicians

- Funny dialogue imitating famous politicians

- Live POOP map of players from around the country

- Fun, bite-sized news of the 2020 election delivered promptly

- A lot of funny voter characters

- Different types of pigeons and other birds who don't want to be left out of the action!

- Unique costumes for your pigeons so that you poop with style. MAGA hat, American flag tie and hat, ninja plungers and many more!
